item.title: Pimco, PGIM See Risk Trump’s Fed Fight Will Drive Up Rates
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- At big bond firms like Pacific Investment Management Co., PGIM and DWS Group, money managers warn that President Donald Trump’s assault on the Federal Reserve’s independence is at odds with his goal of pulling down interest rates. By threatening to undermine the central bank’s inflati...
